original_text: the hand of the Lord will bring a terrible plague on your livestock in the field—on your horses, donkeys and camels and on your cattle, sheep and goats.
korean_text: 여호와의 손이 들에 있는 네 가축 곧 말과 나귀와 낙타와 소와 양에게 더하리니 심한 돌림병이 있을 것이며

sentences.original_text: the hand of the Lord will bring a terrible plague
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 손이 끔찍한 역병을 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on your livestock in the field
on your horses, donkeys and camels
and on your cattle, sheep and goats
